entry.title: Monday night: Chance of drizzle. Low minus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of drizzle before morning with risk of freezing drizzle. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Monday 02 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Rain or drizzle. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of drizzle early in the morning. Rain beginning in the morning. Risk of freezing drizzle early in the morning. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Amount 10 to 15 mm. High plus 3. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Monday 02 January 2023
